description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

COURSE DESCRIPTION

This course aims to develop student’s English proficiency regarding all four language skills. Students are expected to increase their reading and writing literacy along with listening comprehension and communication competence through a variety of in-class and out-of-class activities.

Macintyre & Bohlke. (2019). _Reading Explorer: Book 2 (3rd Edition)._  National Geographic Learning.

REQUIREMENTS & RULES

1.      When students write to the instructor, please ALWAYS put English II: (class time) in the subject line and identify yourself in the email. Anonymous messages WON’T be read.

2.      Students are expected to preview before the class meetings and to work in pairs and in groups. Please be a responsible student and partner.

3.      Attendance is important. A notification of absence form has to be submitted online (學生請假系統). It is also the students’ own responsibility to catch up with the class after their absence.

4.      Please make sure to have the Moodle account and to check both the course site and email regularly. Not receiving a notice/an email is NOT an excuse for absence or late submission.

5.      When submitting assignments by uploading files or posting drive links, please NAME the files correctly. If 1) the files are not readable, 2) the files are not accessible and 3) the files are wrong, these will lead to deduction of the grades.

MOVIE SCRIPT PRESENTATION (Group Project, 3 to 4 people, English-Only)

We need to have

1.  a short clip of a movie you want to introduce
2.  an introduction of what the movie is about
3.  a handout with the script

*   an activity (either before the video or after the presentation)
*   useful expressions in conversation (NOT vocabulary, NOT patterns).

3MT PRESENTATION (https://ntnuengcompetition.weebly.com/)

*   We will learn to deliver a three-minute talk with only ONE slide.
*   Topic: Sustainable Development Goals, SDGs,

“The Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), also known as the Global Goals, were adopted by the United Nations in 2015 as a universal call to action to end poverty, protect the planet, and ensure that by 2030 all people enjoy peace and prosperity.”[https://www.undp.org/sustainable-development-goals](https://www.undp.org/sustainable-development-goals)

1.  SDG 5 - Gender Equality
2.  SDG 11 - Sustainable Cities and Communities
3.  SDG 12 - Responsible Consumption and Production
4.  SDG 13 - Climate Action
5.  SDG 16 - Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions

*   Please record the presentation and upload it to MOODLE.
*   Students are very encouraged to participate in the 3MT competition. Bonus points will be given for _the participation in the competition_.
